channel.title: bitcoin on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in bitcoin on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-22
item.description: Alphabet is putting its prototype robots to work cleaning up around Google’s offices (3 minute read) Alphabet’s Everyday Robots Project team has released some of its prototype machines onto Google’s Bay Area campuses to carry out light custodial tasks.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-08
item.description: Apple Event Announced: ‘California Streaming’ on September 14 With iPhone 13, Apple Watch Series 7 Expected (3 minute read) Apple’s next event will be on September 14 at 10 am.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-30
item.description: Amazon partners with Affirm to roll out first buy now, pay later option on the e-commerce site (2 minute read) Amazon has partnered with Affirm to offer installment payment options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-28
item.description: Google launches a new medical app—outside the United States (5 minute read) Google is launching an app that will use image recognition algorithms to find possible skin conditions in uploaded photos.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-07
item.description: Facebook’s ‘Bulletin’ newsletter platform could launch before the end of June (2 minute read) Facebook’s newsletter subscription service Bulletin could be launched before the end of June.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-13
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will stop accepting bitcoin for car purchases, citing environmental concerns (3 minute read) Tesla has suspended vehicle purchases using bitcoin due to concerns over the increasing use of fossil fuels for bitcoin mining.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-18
item.description: DuckDuckGo surpasses 100 million daily search queries for the first time (2 minute read) DuckDuckGo recently recorded more than 100 million user search queries in a day.
